author: pcs
msg: Add code for the installer DLL. This is the file that replaces
the @@ServerRoot@@ sequences in the configuration files with
the real install directory.
Also here is a test program, in test/, which calls the installer DLL
and can be used to debug it.

author: pcs
msg: InstallShield 2 configuration file (apache.iwz). This replaces the
one previously committed to devsite (it is identical).

author: rse
msg: First part to fix the synchronization-locking for RewriteMap programs under
Unix derivates who doesn't accept the locking of pipes directly.
But we perhaps have another problem: According to FreeBSD's manpage and a hint
by the submitter of PR#1029 flock() has to be used on opened filedescriptors
which are _not_ duplicated via fork().  This currently is not the case...
Submitted by: Ralf S. Engelschall
Reviewed by: Ralf S. Engelschall, Jim Jagielski
